name: Heal the Mummy
description:
Don't be afraid of the ancient tomb! "Heal the Mummy" is one of cool Maze game. Easy to play!

There is a strange Mummy. It seems to be your losing Girl. I am coming. Don't be afraid. Try to use your wisdom to command our hero throw antidote. Keep in mind, our antidotes are limited. Also, our time is short. Let's fighting.

Simple concept, but Plentiful funny. "Heal the Mummy" is one of the best-looking games of its genre which also runs smoothly on older devices. If you are a Puzzle fan, "Heal the Mummy" will provide hours of fun add addictive gameplay.

Feature:
1. How destroyable will the environment be? Real-time! Use bomb to break the Wooden Wall and save your girl.
2. Simple control, Simple concept and run smooth on any Mobile device.
3. Dozens of levels, Use your wisdom to command our Hero.
4. Dramatic and dreamy art design which looks amazing on your device.
5. Exciting music and sounds effects.
6. And more fun in "Heal the Mummy"!
